roleset.name: incite to commit a crime
roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. Verbnet class force-59. No framenet mapping. Framed by Katie.

example.name: example without crime
example.text: [His father * 1] used threats to [* 1] suborn Lady Hallim's adviser.

example.name: example with arg 1
example.text: Mr. Clinton and his surrogates have suborned perjury and obstructed justice.

roleset.name: obtain a false or perjured testimony
roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No verbnet class. No framenet mapping. Framed by Katie.

example.name: testimony as crime
example.text: He was suborning perjury from your client.
